body.raw:
I am currently a Software Developer at [Aphex](https://aphex.co/).
I was previously a Jr. Backend Developer at Code and Theory Manila
where I mostly used PHP to create back-end APIs for the front-ends to consume.
Now I am more focused on JavaScript and the front-end side of things
where I am using ReactJS to create beautiful and reusable user interfaces.

## Currently working on

- My personal site [dalelarroder.com](/)
- Aphex [apps](https://app.aphex.co/) and [design](https://aphex-design.web.app/) system

## Timeline

### 2022

- Learned [Next.js](https://nextjs.org/), [Headless](https://headlessui.com/) UI, [Floating](https://floating-ui.com/) UI, and [NX](https://nx.dev/) Build System
- Successfully migrated our Multi-Repo app into a Monorepo. I wrote a blog about it [here](https://www.dalelarroder.com/blog/how-to-merge-a-repository-into-nx) so I won't forget lol
- Successfully implemented [ArcGIS](https://www.arcgis.com/home/index.html) into our awesome app
- Created my first ever npm package. It's a React component library, my little [playground](https://playground.dalelarroder.com/)
- Created this portfolio website and [open-sourced](https://github.com/dlarroder/dalelarroder) it. I didn't expect it to have any stars tbh

---

### 2021

- Learned how to create custom npm packages
- Learned [Storybook](https://storybook.js.org/) and how to create your own component library
- Contributed in creating the [aphex-design](https://aphex-design.web.app/) component library
- Learned how to work in a Multi-Repo setup with different packages for design and api which are to be consumed by different apps
- Learned [Jest](https://jestjs.io/), [Firebase](https://firebase.google.com/), and [Tailwind CSS](https://tailwindcss.com/)

---

### 2020

- Started Freelancing during the pandemic
- Created APIs for the City of Taguig's [Tax Payment App](https://payment.taguig.gov.ph/)
- Learned payment gateways such as [eGHL](https://e-ghl.com/) and [Paymaya](https://www.paymaya.com/)
   
- Started a job as a Software Engineer at [Cell 5](https://www.cell5.co.uk/)
- Learned [ReactJS](https://reactjs.org/), [TypeScript](https://www.typescriptlang.org/), [Redux](https://redux.js.org/), and [Ant Design](https://ant.design/)

---

### 2019

- Graduated from Ateneo de Zamboanga University with a Bachelor's Degree in Information Technology major in Web Development
- Started a job as a Junior Backend Developer at [Code and Theory](https://www.codeandtheory.com/)
- Learned [Git](https://git-scm.com/book/en/v2/Getting-Started-About-Version-Control), [Scrum](https://www.scrum.org/resources/what-is-scrum), and [Five D's](https://www.creativerevolution.com.au/blog/the-5-ds-of-strategic-design) of strategic design
- Learned how to create RESTful and GraphQL APIs using [Laravel](https://laravel.com/)
- Learned [Drupal](https://www.drupal.org/) CMS

---

### 2018

- Qualified in the 14th [Smart Sweep](https://smart.com.ph/About/newsroom/full-news/2018/05/16/cebu-schools-sweep-top-awards-at-smart-innovation-competition) national competition and won the Ericsson Technology for Good Award

body.raw:
## Editor
  • My editor of choice is [Visual Studio Code](https://code.visualstudio.com/) with a giant pile of [extensions](https://howivscode.com/dlarroder)
  • I am currently using [Tokyo Night](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=enkia.tokyo-night) as my theme
  • [Fira Code](https://github.com/tonsky/FiraCode) is my font of choice mainly because of the ligatures
## Terminal
  • I use [Hyper](https://hyper.is/) when I'm on Ubuntu and Mac
  • [Windows Terminal](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/p/windows-terminal/9n0dx20hk701) when I'm on Windows. It's running [WSL2](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/wsl/install) with [oh-my-zsh](https://ohmyz.sh/) stock
  • All terminals use [Fira Code](https://github.com/tonsky/FiraCode) as fonts because ligatures all the way
## Desktop Apps
  • [Brave](https://brave.com/) is my main browser for both browsing and development
  • [Postman](https://www.postman.com/) for API development and testing
  • [Figma](https://www.figma.com/) mainly for inspecting designs
  • [Slack](https://slack.com/) and [Discord](https://discord.com/) for messaging or calls
  • [Jira](https://www.atlassian.com/software/jira) and [Notion](https://www.notion.so/) for issue tracking and notes
  • [Spotify](https://www.spotify.com/ph-en/) for music
## Desk Setup
  • Laptop:
    • [Macbook Pro](https://www.apple.com/ph/shop/buy-mac/macbook-pro/16-inch) 16 inch M1 Pro
  • PC Specs:
    • Processor: Ryzen 7 [7700](https://www.amd.com/en/products/apu/amd-ryzen-7-7700)
    • Motherboard: MSI MAG [B650 TOMAHAWK ](https://www.msi.com/Motherboard/MAG-B650-TOMAHAWK-WIFI) WIFI
    • GPU: Zotac Trinity GeForce [RTX 3090](https://www.zotac.com/us/product/graphics_card/zotac-gaming-geforce-rtx-3090-trinity) 24gb
    • RAM: Corsair [Dominator Platinum](https://www.corsair.com/us/en/Categories/Products/Memory/DOMINATOR-PLATINUM-RGB-DDR5-Memory---Black/p/CMT32GX5M2B5200C38) 32GB RGB 5200MHz
    • CPU Cooler: [NZXT Kraken Z63](https://nzxt.com/product/kraken-z63-rgb) RGB (Black)
    • Case: Lian Li [O11 Dynamic Mini](https://lian-li.com/product/o11-dynamic-mini/) Der8auer Edition (Black)
    • Monitor: [Asus TUF Gaming VG27AQ](https://www.asus.com/Displays-Desktops/Monitors/TUF-Gaming/TUF-Gaming-VG27AQ/)
  • Sound:
    • Main headset for gaming: [Steelseries Arctis 7](https://steelseries.com/gaming-headsets/arctis-7)
    • Secondary headset for chillin: [Sony WH-1000XM4](https://www.sony.com.ph/electronics/headband-headphones/wh-1000xm4)
    • Main earbuds: [AirPods Pro](https://www.apple.com/ph/airpods-pro/)
## Keyboards
  • My main keyboard is a [GMMK Pro](https://www.pcgamingrace.com/products/glorious-gmmk-pro-75-barebone-black) (White Ice)
    • Switches: [Gazzew Boba U4t](https://zionstudios.ph/product/gazzew-boba-u4t-thocky-tactile-switches/) (Lubed with [Krytox 205g0](https://divinikey.com/products/205-grade-0-switch-lubricant) and Filmed with [Deskeys Film](https://divinikey.com/products/deskeys-switch-film))
    • Stabilizers: [Durock V2](https://divinikey.com/products/durock-v2-stabilizers-screw-in) (Lubed with [Permatex 22058](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B000AL8VD2?tag=switchclick-20&geniuslink=true))
    • Keycaps: [Milkyway CMM BOW](https://zionstudios.ph/product/groupbuy-milkyway-cmm-bow/)
  • My secondary keyboard is a [Tecware Phantom Elite](https://www.tecware.co/phantomelite)
    • Switches: [Akko CS Lavender Purple](https://en.akkogear.com/product/akko-cs-lavender-purple-switch-45pcs/) (Lubed with Krytox 205g0)
    • Stabilizers: Stock stabs (Lubed with [Permatex 22058](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B000AL8VD2?tag=switchclick-20&geniuslink=true))
    • Keycaps: [KBDfans DSA 9009](https://kbdfans.com/products/dsa-9009-keycaps-set?_pos=5&_sid=68694e57a&_ss=r)
